alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Clark; Coles; Douglas; Edgar; Vermilion (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 05 at 11:56PM CST until March 06 at 1:00AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Coles County in east central Illinois... Edgar County in east central Illinois... Northern Clark County in east central Illinois... Southern Vermilion County in east central Illinois... Southern Champaign County in east central Illinois... Douglas County in east central Illinois... * Until 100 AM CST. * At 1156 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Allenville, or near Sullivan, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Cooks Mill around 1200 AM CST. Arcola and Humboldt around 1205 AM CST. Hindsboro and Rardin around 1215 AM CST. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Oakland, Newman, Brocton, Hume, Redmon, Paris and Chrisman. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 between mile markers 181 and 223. Interstate 70 between mile markers 136 and 154. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Champaign; Clark; Coles; Douglas; Edgar; Vermilion
